H0.text: Radiant energy for nuclear energy is the two types of energy exchanged in a greenhouse, which is an example of a closed system.

H1.text: Radiant energy for thermal energy are the two types of energy exchanged in a greenhouse, which is an example of a closed system.

H2.text: Thermal energy for nuclear energy is the two types of energy exchanged in a greenhouse, which is an example of a closed system.

H3.text: Nuclear energy for chemical energy is the two types of energy exchanged in a greenhouse, which is an example of a closed system.
